item.description:
This is a fun walk that we have done before. Meet at Davis Square and walk along the red line train stations. Once we have been walking for an hour, we can turn around and go back...or we can walk straight for two hours and take the T back to Davis. The possibilities are endless....

Meet outside of China Sun restaraunt on Holland St at 7 pm. (It's not China Sun anymore but a still under construction 'Taipei Tokyo') Bring your walking shoes!
item.name: Red Line Ramble
